metadata.synopsis: Player approaches Tara and sees she is carrying an item. Player tries to convince Tara to give the item over. If Gale is in party he will be favoured speaker and will recognize Tara and why she has a magic item with her.

12.speaker: Tara the Tressym
12.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I'd like to know if you have any other interesting objects to trade.

21.speaker: Tara the Tressym
21.text: I've a nose for the things, in fact.

17.speaker: Tara the Tressym
17.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *The tressym is at its ease, a glint of satisfaction in her sparkling eye.*
25.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

38.speaker: Tara the Tressym
38.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

40.speaker: Tara the Tressym
40.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

43.speaker: Tara the Tressym
43.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

48.speaker: Tara the Tressym
48.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: Have you got any other magic objects you'd be willing to part with?

87.speaker: Tara the Tressym
87.text: I may, or I may not. Depends what you have to offer in return. I have very high standards, mind.

58.speaker: Narrator
58.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

74.speaker: Narrator
74.text: *The tressym looks at you expectantly, a shiny ring at its feet.*
74.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Open your pack and offer a trade.

79.speaker: Tara the Tressym
79.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

83.speaker: Tara the Tressym
83.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

92.speaker: Tara the Tressym
92.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

110.speaker: Tara the Tressym
110.text: Do I look like I have anything else to say to you, darling?

115.speaker: Tara the Tressym
115.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

120.speaker: Tara the Tressym
120.text: Oh - that's quite all right. I don't need anything else from you.
120.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

121.speaker: Tara the Tressym
121.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

123.speaker: Tara the Tressym
123.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

62.speaker: Tara the Tressym
62.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*
62.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

27.speaker: Tara the Tressym
27.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*
27.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*
11.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*
5.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

112.speaker: Narrator
112.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*

64.text: *The tressym seems nervous, but you can't quite tell why.*
64.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

168.speaker: Narrator
168.text: *The tressym seems nervous, but you can't quite tell why.*
168.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

34.speaker: Player
34.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

156.speaker: Tara the Tressym
156.text: Sorry, I don't believe we've met. Or if we have, let's pretend we haven't.
156.context: NodeContext: Coy, she's pretending not to know the player.

3.speaker: Tara the Tressym
3.text: Nice to see you too, Mr Dekarios.

148.speaker: Player
148.text: What are you doing here, kitty?
148.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

151.speaker: Tara the Tressym
151.text: Kitty? How vulgar. You can call me - actually, it's better if you don't call me at all. That'll be all, thank you.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: What sharp claws and teeth you have. You wouldn't have anything to do with some missing messenger pigeons, would you?
80.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

42.speaker: Tara the Tressym
42.text: Please. I don't dirty my paws for anything less than pheasant. Now if you'll excuse me, I'm busy luxuriating in solitude.
42.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

166.speaker: Player
166.text: Are you sure? I'd hate for anything abrupt to happen while I'm seeking out the culprit.
166.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

170.speaker: Tara the Tressym
170.text: If I didn't know better, I'd think you were threatening me.
170.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

24.speaker: Tara the Tressym
24.text: If I didn't know better, I'd think you were threatening me.

91.speaker: Tara the Tressym
91.text: I ate the pigeons. Are you satisfied? I prevaricated before. Pigeon is my second-most-favourite meat.

128.text: I shalln't be bullied, harangued, or deceived. Do you hear?
128.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

137.speaker: Tara the Tressym
137.text: I shalln't be bullied, harangued, or deceived. Do you hear?
137.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I'll happily leave you be, as soon as I find out what happened to those pigeons.

30.text: Ugh. If it'll hasten your departure...

63.speaker: Tara the Tressym
63.text: Ugh. If it'll hasten your departure...

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I've been sent here to take you in for questioning. You can avoid an unpleasant trip inside if you tell me the truth now.

67.text: Like you'd be able to lay so much as a finger on me. Still, I've no desire to watch you flail about in the attempt.

56.speaker: Tara the Tressym
56.text: Like you'd be able to lay so much as a finger on me. Still, I've no desire to watch you flail about in the attempt.

174.speaker: Player
174.text: Quite a nice ring you have there. What are you going to do with it?

132.speaker: Tara the Tressym
132.text: That's for me to know, isn't it?

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I could really use such an artefact in my fight against evil.

124.speaker: Tara the Tressym
124.text: Ugh. Take it. Curse this bleeding heart of mine. But use it well, you hear?

52.speaker: Tara the Tressym
52.text: Ugh. Take it. Curse this bleeding heart of mine. But use it well, you hear?

13.speaker: Player
13.text: About the missing pigeons in the post house...

68.speaker: Tara the Tressym
68.text: What of them? I don't dirty my paws for anything less than pheasant, I'll have you know.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Thank you! I'll take my leave.

103.speaker: Tara the Tressym
103.text: Well, I never! Keep it, then, you lout.

20.speaker: Tara the Tressym
20.text: Well, I never! Keep it, then, you lout.

81.text: Tut tut, what manners! Good day to you!
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's attempt for the ring fails/ they whiff it.

173.speaker: Tara the Tressym
173.text: Tut tut, what manners! Good day to you!
173.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player's attempt for the ring fails/ they whiff it.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: From the look of those letters, one might guess you've been eating carrier pigeons.
130.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

69.speaker: Player
69.text: From the look of those letters, one might guess you were responsible for the post house's missing pigeons.
69.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

119.speaker: Tara the Tressym
119.text: One needn't guess. Pigeon meat is my second-favourite.
119.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Those letters are important. You shouldn't be eating their messengers.
102.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

70.speaker: Tara the Tressym
70.text: Importance is relative. A letter may be important to one; a growling belly may be more important to another.
70.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

169.speaker: Tara the Tressym
169.text: But let's not get bogged down in semantics. I believe you were just leaving, weren't you? Taaa!
169.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

147.speaker: Player
147.text: No! Leave these pigeons be or I'll eat you.
147.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

7.speaker: Tara the Tressym
7.text: Hah! I'd actually enjoy watching you try.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

88.speaker: Tara the Tressym
88.text: Hah! I'd actually enjoy watching you try.

28.speaker: Tara the Tressym
28.text: But let's not allow our baser natures to prevail. In truth, I've grown tired of this rooftop anyway.

6.speaker: Tara the Tressym
6.text: I'll be on my way, then. There are a few places in the city I'd like to visit. I might've sussed some interesting items I'd rather like to get my paws upon.

84.speaker: Tara the Tressym
84.text: If I find anything interesting, I might even be willing to barter. Might. Tara - away!

95.text: How very dare you! How very dare you indeed!
95.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

86.speaker: Tara the Tressym
86.text: How very dare you! How very dare you indeed!
86.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra shoots fireball at player

116.speaker: Player
116.text: I'm not leaving 'til you agree to stop hunting these pigeons.

94.speaker: Tara the Tressym
94.text: Ugh. In service of not having to make any further conversation with you, I concede.

4.speaker: Tara the Tressym
4.text: Ugh. In service of not having to make any further conversation with you, I concede.

9.text: That's fine. But don't expect me to entertain you.

49.speaker: Tara the Tressym
49.text: That's fine. But don't expect me to entertain you.

159.speaker: Player
159.text: There's a much better aviary across town, if you've already picked over the choice cuts here.

138.speaker: Tara the Tressym
138.text: Another aviary, you say? Well, that does sound quite interesting. The brood here is getting a little thin.

89.speaker: Tara the Tressym
89.text: Another aviary, you say? Well, that does sound quite interesting. The brood here is getting a little thin.

61.speaker: Tara the Tressym
61.text: Perhaps while I'm seeking out this new feasthall, I'll pay a few visits around town. I might've sussed some interesting items I'd rather like to get my paws upon.

155.text: I doubt you know the first thing about choosing pigeon meat. As such, I'll be ignoring you starting... now.

32.speaker: Tara the Tressym
32.text: I doubt you know the first thing about choosing pigeon meat. As such, I'll be ignoring you starting... now.

101.speaker: Tara the Tressym
101.text: Thank you. I most certainly will. When I've had my fill of the local fare, I may look for more interesting pastures.

60.speaker: Tara the Tressym
60.text: There are a few places in the city I'd like to visit. I might've sussed some interesting items I'd rather like to get my paws upon.

172.speaker: Player
172.text: If pigeon is your second-favourite, what's your first?

100.speaker: Tara the Tressym
100.text: Beholder, but it's exceedingly rare to come by.

129.speaker: Tara the Tressym
129.text: A tressym doesn't hunt; she locks into a sacred dance with her prey - one as elemental as it is ancient.

82.speaker: Tara the Tressym
82.text: But anyway - thank you. It will be happy indeed.

73.speaker: Tara the Tressym
73.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*

163.speaker: Tara the Tressym
163.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*

171.text: *You notice the tressym guards a shiny ring and stack of letters at its feet.*

59.speaker: Narrator
59.text: *You grab the ring, spooking the tressym.*

10.speaker: Narrator
10.text: *You grab the ring, spooking the tressym.*

164.text: *You dive forward but miss the ring entirely. The tressym flies away, and the ring disappears with her.*

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: *You dive forward but miss the ring entirely. The tressym flies away, and the ring disappears with her.*

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Gently approach the tressym and attempt to take the ring without alarming her.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

113.speaker: Narrator
113.text: *She doesn't seem to mind. You take the ring without so much as a 'mew'.*
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

99.speaker: Narrator
99.text: *She doesn't seem to mind. You take the ring without so much as a 'mew'.*

39.text: *She startles, and you miss the ring. She flies away before you can make a second attempt.*
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *She startles, and you miss the ring. She flies away before you can make a second attempt.*
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: Try to discern the nature of the creature's ill temper.

71.speaker: Narrator
71.text: *As you assess the creature, you notice a stack of letters and shiny ring at the creature's feet.*

108.speaker: Narrator
108.text: *As you assess the creature, you notice a stack of letters and shiny ring at the creature's feet.*

96.speaker: Player
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

114.speaker: Tara the Tressym
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

77.speaker: Tara the Tressym
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: She startles and flies away.

33.speaker: Player
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player appraoches to pet Tara but she growls, warning them away.NodeContext: She snarls, warning the player away

19.speaker: Tara the Tressym
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player appraoches to pet Tara but she growls, warning them away.NodeContext: She snarls, warning the player away

140.text: *The tressym seems a little tense, but you aren't sure why.*

149.speaker: Narrator
149.text: *The tressym seems a little tense, but you aren't sure why.*

157.speaker: Narrator
157.text: *The tressym looks at you expectantly, a shiny ring at its feet.*
